import img1 from "../../../assets/imgs/service/service-control-600x747.png"; import ServiceGetStarted from "../../../components/ServiceGetStarted"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const CustomerServiceControl = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>

{t("customer-service-control-title")}

{t("customer-service-control-t-1")}

{t("customer-service-control-p-1")}

{t("customer-service-control-t-2")}

{t("customer-service-control-p-2")}

{t("customer-service-control-t-3")}

{t("customer-service-control-p-3")}

{t("customer-service-control-t-4")}

{t("customer-service-control-p-4")}

); }; export default CustomerServiceControl;
